text:
Does this work in current CVS?
Are you making sure to modify the DOM in the update thread?

If your SVG content lacks script elements then we assume it is a static 
document.
You can override this behaviour in the JSVGCanvas by calling 
JSVGCompnent.setDocumentState(JSVGComponent.ALWAYS_DYNAMIC);
